item.title: How-to install IDM
item.description: IDM installation Note: this post will show you how to install IDM on a Debian based machine (like Ubuntu). The following instructions were tested on Debian 9.0 (stretch) y Ubuntu 17.04 (zesty). If you use Vagrant, you can download our VagrantFile for both setups. Setting up Debian repositories IDM is located on ARCO’s pike repository. To install it, run the following command: console $ wget -qO- 'http://pike.esi.uclm.es/add-pike-repo.sh' | sudo sh Installing ZeroC Ice for Python3 With a fresh installation of Debian 9.
